title: Single Family Home with Detached Studio – Grote Berg, Curaçao
description: Work where you vacation and live where others escape. This beautifully designed modern family residence in Grote Berg, Curaçao offers a rare combination of comfort, style, and investment potential. Set on a generous 715 m² of owned land, the property is fully move-in ready and thoughtfully crafted for relaxed island living. The main residence features three spacious, air-conditioned bedrooms and two contemporary bathrooms, including a luxurious en-suite. At the heart of the home is a chef-style gourmet kitchen, equipped with a central cooking island, built-in wine cooler, integrated grill, extractor hood, soft-close cabinetry, spice storage, and a discreet built-in trash system — ideal for both everyday living and entertaining. A bright open-plan living and dining area flows seamlessly to a large covered back porch, where cooling island breezes and sunset views create the perfect setting for outdoor relaxation. The private swimming pool enhances the resort-style atmosphere, making this home equally suited for personal enjoyment or hosting guests. A fully detached studio adds exceptional flexibility, offering strong rental income potential or comfortable accommodation for visitors. Additional features include an outdoor storage area, a dedicated laundry room, and optional furniture purchase. A recent valuation report is available, providing added confidence for buyers. This is more than a home — it is a turnkey lifestyle investment in one of Curaçao’s most desirable residential areas.
